title: "Your Research Poster Title Goes Here"
subtitle: "Subtitle or Additional Context"
conference: "Conference Name 2025"

# Author line with superscript affiliations (use ¹²³ for numbers)
# Use <strong> for bold, not markdown **
author-line: "<strong>First Author</strong>¹, Second Author¹², Third Author²"

# Affiliations (displayed below author names)
affiliation-line: "¹College of Information Science, University of Arizona    ²Department of Computer Science, University of Arizona"

contact-email: "author1@arizona.edu"

# ============================================
# FORMAT: Generally don't need to change these
# ============================================
format:
  html:
    theme:
      - cosmo
      - infosci-poster.scss
    toc: false
    embed-resources: true
    page-layout: custom
    title-block-style: none
    section-divs: false
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <style>
        /* Remove Quarto default margins and enable landscape */
        html, body { margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow-x: auto; }
        main.content { padding: 0; margin: 0; max-width: none; }
        #quarto-content { padding: 0; }
        </style>
    include-after-body:
      text: |
        <style>
        /* Fix column grid layout - override Quarto defaults (loaded last) */
        .poster-body { display: grid !important; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr !important; width: 100% !important; }
        .poster-body > .column, .poster-body > div.column { flex: unset !important; width: auto !important; overflow-x: visible !important; min-width: 0 !important; }
        /* Fix gap between h2 headers and card content */
        .column h2 + p, .column h2 + ul, .column h2 + ol, .column h2 + div,
        .column h2 ~ p, .column h2 ~ ul, .column h2 ~ ol, .column h2 ~ div {
          margin-top: -14pt !important;
        }
        /* Fix list indentation */
        .column ul, .column ol { padding-left: 0.5in !important; }
        .column li { margin-bottom: 0.08in; }
        </style>
---
